00015 // Change a random body parameter
00016 bool BodyModel::MutateDiffuse(BodyMap& proposed) {
00017         // fail if there are no bodies
00018         if (proposed.GetCount() == 0)
00019                 return false;
00020 
00021         Body *b = proposed.GetRandomValue(); // choose one body randomly
00022         // choose one parameter
00023         if ((cvRandInt(&rnd_seed)) % 2 == 0) {
00024                 b->SetHeight(b->GetHeight() + (2*cvRandReal(&rnd_seed)-1)*m_heightS);           
00025                 b->SetHeight(min(b->GetHeight(), m_maxHeight));
00026                 b->SetHeight(max(b->GetHeight(), m_minHeight));
00027         }
00028         else {
00029                 //echo(String::Concat(S"shake w: "));
00030                 b->SetWidth(b->GetWidth() + (2*cvRandReal(&rnd_seed)-1)*m_widthS);
00031                 b->SetWidth(min(b->GetWidth(), m_maxWidth));
00032                 b->SetWidth(max(b->GetWidth(), m_minWidth));
00033         }
00034         //ech(String::Concat(S"DIFFUSE: ", __box(proposed[i]->id)));
00035         return true;
00036 }
00037 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 // Change position of a random body
00039 bool BodyModel::MutateMove(BodyMap& proposed) {
00040         // fail if there are no bodies
00041         if (proposed.GetCount() == 0)
00042                 return false;
00043 
00044         // update position of a random body
00045         Body *b = proposed.GetRandomValue(); // choose one body randomly
00046         CvPoint3D32f pos = b->GetFoot();
00047         int choice = cvRandInt(&rnd_seed) % 100;
00048         if (choice >= 0 && choice < 10) {
00049                 // 1 - shift in the direction of gradient descent (P = 4/5)
00050                 b->MoveTo(b->MeanShift(imgFrame, fg));
00051                 //doc->Message(String::Format("MOVE: {0} dx={1}, dy={2}", b->id, pos.x - b->bot.x, pos.y - b->bot.y));
00052         }
00053         else if (choice < 80) {
00054                 // 2 - move a random displacement
00055                 const OFFSET = 10;
00056                 CvPoint3D32f pos_new = cvPoint3D32f(pos.x + (float)(2*m_distanceConfidence*cvRandReal(&rnd_seed)-m_distanceConfidence), 
00057                                                                                         pos.y + (float)(2*m_distanceConfidence*cvRandReal(&rnd_seed)-m_distanceConfidence),
00058                                                                                         pos.z);
00059                 b->MoveTo(pos_new);
00060         }
00061         else {
00062                 // 3 - move to the closest top candidate (P = 1/5)
00063                 double min_dist = 1e10;
00064                 BlobRay* min_ray = NULL;
00065                 for (int blobi=0;blobi<doc->blobmodel.blob.GetCount();blobi++) {
00066                         CvSeq* heads = doc->blobmodel.blob[blobi]->heads;
00067                         for (int headi=0;headi<heads->total;headi++) {
00068                                 BlobRay* br = (BlobRay*)cvGetSeqElem(heads, headi);
00069                                 double dist = d(cvPointTo32f(br->p1), b->GetImageHead());
00070                                 if (dist < min_dist) {
00071                                         min_dist = dist;
00072                                         min_ray = br;
00073                                 }
00074                         }
00075                 }               
00076                 if (!min_ray)
00077                         return false;
00078                 b->MoveTo(doc->cameramodel.coordsImage2Real(cvPointTo32f(min_ray->p2), 0));
00079         }
00080         return true;
00081 }
00082 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00083 // Exchange two body positions
00084 bool BodyModel::MutateExchange(BodyMap& proposed) {
00085         // fail if there are less than two bodies
00086         if (proposed.GetCount() < 2)
00087                 return false;
00088         
00089         Body *b1 = proposed.GetRandomValue(), *b2;
00090         do {
00091                 b2 = proposed.GetRandomValue();
00092         } while (b1->id == b2->id);
00093 
00094         CvPoint3D32f _top, _bot;
00095         _top = b1->top;
00096         _bot = b1->bot;
00097         b1->top = b2->top;
00098         b1->bot = b2->bot;
00099         b2->top = _top;
00100         b2->bot = _bot;
00101         return true;
00102 }

00104 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00105 // Delete a random body
00106 bool BodyModel::MutateDelete(BodyMap& proposed) {
00107         // fail if there are no bodies
00108         if (proposed.GetCount() == 0)
00109                 return false;
00110         Body *b = proposed.GetRandomValue();
00111         if (doc->doormodel.GetDistanceFromClosestDoor(b->bot) > m_maxDoorDistance)
00112                 return false;
00113 
00114         proposed.RemoveKey(b->id);
00115         return true;
00116 }
00117 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00118 // Create a new body from a random top candidate of a random blob
00119 bool BodyModel::MutateNew(BodyMap& proposed) {
00120         // fail if there are no blobs
00121         if (doc->blobmodel.blob.GetCount() == 0)
00122                 return false;
00123         
00124         // get a list of head candidates
00125         int i = cvRandInt(&rnd_seed) % doc->blobmodel.blob.GetCount();
00126         CvSeq* heads = doc->blobmodel.blob[i]->heads;
00127         
00128         // fail if there are no head candidates
00129         if (heads->total == 0)
00130                 return false;
00131 
00132         // pick a random head-foot candidate and compute its real coordinates
00133         CvPoint3D32f h3, f3;
00134         int j = cvRandInt(&rnd_seed) % heads->total;
00135         BlobRay* br = (BlobRay*)cvGetSeqElem(heads, j);
00136         doc->cameramodel.coordsImage2RealSameXY_Feet2Floor(cvPointTo32f(br->p1), cvPointTo32f(br->p2), &h3, &f3);
00137         double height = h3.z-f3.z;
00138         CvPoint center = cvPoint((br->p1.x+br->p2.x)/2, (br->p1.y+br->p2.y)/2);
00139 
00140         // if initial candidate is longer that two bodies => use either upper or lower part
00141         if (height > m_maxHeight) {
00142                 double random = 2*cvRandReal(&rnd_seed)-1;
00143                 double height_new = m_heightM+m_heightS*random;
00144                 double dx = (br->p1.x-br->p2.x)*(height_new/height);
00145                 double dy = (br->p1.y-br->p2.y)*(height_new/height);
00146                 if ((cvRandInt(&rnd_seed)) % 2 == 0) {
00147                         br->p1.x = (int)(br->p2.x + dx);
00148                         br->p1.y = (int)(br->p2.y + dy);
00149                 }
00150                 else {
00151                         br->p2.x = (int)(br->p1.x - dx);
00152                         br->p2.y = (int)(br->p1.y - dy);
00153                 }
00154         }
00155 
00156         // if initial candidate is to short, but not tiny :-) => expand the body around it's center
00157         if (height < m_minHeight && height > m_minHeight/2) { 
00158                 double random = 2*cvRandReal(&rnd_seed)-1;
00159                 double height_new = m_heightM+m_heightS*random;
00160                 br->p1.x = (int)(center.x - (center.x-br->p1.x)*(height_new/height));
00161                 br->p1.y = (int)(center.y - (center.y-br->p1.y)*(height_new/height));
00162                 br->p2.x = (int)(center.x - (center.x-br->p2.x)*(height_new/height));
00163                 br->p2.y = (int)(center.y - (center.y-br->p2.y)*(height_new/height));
00164         }
00165 
00166         // reject very small blob candidates
00167         if (height < m_minHeight/2)
00168                 return false;
00169 
00170         doc->cameramodel.coordsImage2RealSameXY_Feet2Floor(cvPointTo32f(br->p1), cvPointTo32f(br->p2), &h3, &f3);
00171 
00172         // fail if body is too far from the doors
00173         if (doc->doormodel.GetDistanceFromClosestDoor(f3) > m_maxDoorDistance)
00174                 return false;
00175 
00176         // add new body(s) to the proposed body model
00177         //ech(String::Concat(S"NEW:     ", __box(last_id)));
00178         proposed[last_id++] = new Body(br, doc, last_id, (int)doc->trackermodel.m_frameNumber);
00179         return true;
00180 }
00181 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00182 // Removes any bodies that were without a blob for a long time
00183 void BodyModel::RemoveEmpty(BodyMap& accepted) {
00184         POSITION pos = accepted.GetStartPosition();
00185         while (pos) {
00186                 int i; Body *b;
00187                 accepted.GetNextAssoc(pos, i, b);
00188                 cvZero(temp);
00189                 b->RasterizeFrame(temp, cvScalar(1));
00190                 cvAnd(fg, temp, temp);
00191                 double pixFG = cvSum(temp).val[0];
00192                 if (pixFG == 0) 
00193                         b->invisibleFor++;
00194                 else 
00195                         b->invisibleFor = 0;
00196 
00197                 if ((1-b->dHist) < m_maxHistChange && d(b->bot, b->predicted) < m_maxPosChange)
00198                         b->dormantFor++;
00199                 else
00200                         b->dormantFor = 0;
00201                 if (b->invisibleFor > m_invisibleFor || b->dormantFor > m_dormantFor) {
00202                         accepted.RemoveKey(i);
00203                 }
00204 
00205         }
00206 }
00207 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00208 // Removes any bodies that are outside of the interest region
00209 void BodyModel::RemoveOutsiders(BodyMap& accepted) {
00210         POSITION pos = accepted.GetStartPosition();
00211         while (pos) {
00212                 int i; Body *b;
00213                 accepted.GetNextAssoc(pos, i, b);
00214                 CvPoint2D32f foot = b->GetImageFoot();
00215                 if (foot.y >= doc->cameramodel.h || foot.x >= doc->cameramodel.w) {
00216                         b->outsiderFor++;
00217                         continue;
00218                 }
00219                 if (!doc->doormodel.IsInsideInterestRegion(foot))
00220                         b->outsiderFor++;
00221                 else
00222                         b->outsiderFor = 0;
00223                 
00224                 if (b->outsiderFor > m_outsiderFor)
00225                         accepted.RemoveKey(i);
00226         }
00227 }
00228 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00229 // Add a body to each completely unoccupied blob and reflect changes in Z-buffer
00230 void BodyModel::NewForEachBlob(BodyMap& accepted) {
00231         for (int i=0;i<doc->blobmodel.blob.GetCount();i++) {
00232                 cvZero(fg);
00233                 doc->blobmodel.blob[i]->Rasterize(fg, cvScalar(1));
00234                 cvThreshold(body_zbuffer, temp, 0, 1, CV_THRESH_BINARY);
00235                 cvAnd(fg, temp, temp);
00236                 if (cvSum(temp).val[0] == 0) {
00237                         CvSeq* heads = doc->blobmodel.blob[i]->heads;
00238                         if (heads->total > 0) {
00239                                 // get the best (tallest) head candidate
00240                                 BlobRay* br = (BlobRay*)cvGetSeqElem(heads, 0);
00241 
00242                                 // check if inside the door interest region
00243                                 CvScalar p = cvGet2D(door_mask, (int)br->p2.y, (int)br->p2.x);
00244                                 if (p.val[0] == 0)
00245                                         continue;
00246                                 
00247                                 double height = doc->cameramodel.computeHeight(cvPointTo32f(br->p1), cvPointTo32f(br->p2));
00248                                 
00249                                 // reject very small blobs
00250                                 if (height < m_minHeight/2)
00251                                         continue;
00252 
00253                                 if (height < m_minHeight) { 
00254                                         CvPoint center = cvPoint((br->p1.x+br->p2.x)/2, (br->p1.y+br->p2.y)/2);
00255                                         double random = 2*cvRandReal(&rnd_seed)-1;
00256                                         double height_new = m_heightM+m_heightS*random;
00257                                         br->p1.x = (int)(center.x - (center.x-br->p1.x)*(height_new/height));
00258                                         br->p1.y = (int)(center.y - (center.y-br->p1.y)*(height_new/height));
00259                                         br->p2.x = (int)(center.x - (center.x-br->p2.x)*(height_new/height));
00260                                         br->p2.y = (int)(center.y - (center.y-br->p2.y)*(height_new/height));
00261                                 }
00262                                 accepted[last_id++] = new Body(br, doc, last_id, (int)doc->trackermodel.m_frameNumber);
00263                                 UpdateZBuffer(body_zbuffer, accepted, doc->obstaclemodel.obstacle, BODIES_MINUS_OBSTACLES);
00264                         }
00265                 }
00266         }
00267 }
00268 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00269 void BodyModel::UpdateRecentlyDeleted(BodyMap& arr_after, BodyMap& arr_before, BodyMap& arr_deleted, int frame) {
00270         // clean up arr_deleted from old bodies
00271         POSITION pos = arr_deleted.GetStartPosition();
00272         while (pos) {
00273                 int i; Body *b;
00274                 arr_deleted.GetNextAssoc(pos, i, b);
00275                 if (b->stopFrame < frame-m_maxDeletedAge)
00276                         arr_deleted.RemoveKey(i);
00277 
00278         // fill up arr_deleted with the newly deleted bodies
00279         POSITION pos = arr_before.GetStartPosition();
00280         while (pos) {
00281                 int i; Body *b;
00282                 arr_before.GetNextAssoc(pos, i, b);
00283                 Body* b_after;
00284                 if (!arr_after.Lookup(b->id, b_after)) // if body is deleted in a new array
00285                         b->stopFrame = frame;
00286                         arr_deleted[b->id] = b; // add to recently deleted array
00287                 }
00288         }
00289 }
00290 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00291 void BodyModel::ReplaceNewWithRecentlyDeleted(BodyMap& arr_after, BodyMap& arr_before, BodyMap& arr_deleted, int delta_age, double delta_distance) {
00292         POSITION pos = arr_after.GetStartPosition();
00293         while (pos) {
00294                 int i; Body *b_after;
00295                 arr_after.GetNextAssoc(pos, i, b_after);
00296                 Body* b_before;
00297                 if (!arr_before.Lookup(b_after->id, b_before)) { // if body is new
00298                         Body* match = FindBodyMatchByAgeAndDistance(arr_deleted, b_after, delta_age, delta_distance); // find a match in recently deleted array
00299                         if (match) {
00300                                 doc->Message(String::Format("Recovered {0}", match->id));
00301                                 b_after->id = match->id;
00302                                 *(match) = *(b_after);
00303                                 arr_deleted.RemoveKey(match->id);
00304                         }
00305                 }
00306         }       
00307 }
